result.eng: Mind the gap between the door and the plaform.
result.ga: Seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardán
result.orig: Seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardán
result.html: Seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardánMind the gap between the door and the plaform.
result.ponchtml: Seaċain an ḃearna idir an doras agus an t-ardánMind the gap between the door and the plaform.

result.eng: Watch out, your bag is open!
result.ga: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.orig: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.html: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!
result.ponchtml: Seaċain tá do ṁála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!

result.html: SeachainWatch out!
result.ponchtml: SeaċainWatch out!
